dct_title_s: Poli Arctici, et circumiacentium terrarum descriptio novissima
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes decorative title cartouche and blank dedication cartouche. From: Atlas, or, A geographicke description of the regions, countries and kingdoms of the world ... Printed at Amsterdam : by Henry Hondius and Iohn Iohnson, Anno 1636. Text in English on verso.
